roleset.name: fill out as with flesh, by the addition of details

role.descr: agent, cause of fleshing out, planner
source, arg1 is fleshed out from what idea?

example.name: Transitive
example.text: They would jointly strive to continuously enrich and flesh out the content of the strategic cooperative partnership between the two countries.
example.arg: the content of the strategic cooperative partnership between the two countries.

example.name: With Source
example.text: The playwright fleshed out the characters from her own experiences with family members.
example.arg: from her own experiences with family members.

roleset.note: FLESH_OUT-V NOTES: Created by Claire (from flesh.01-v)
